name: Access the Web Automation demo

testSteps.description: Given than jean wants to access the Web Demo Site

children.description: Omar opens the Demo automation page

testSteps.description:
When He makes the register on the page
| firstName | lastName | address | email | phone | gender | hobbies1 | hobbies3 | languages1 | languages2 | skills | country | selectCountry | year | month | day | password | confirmPassword |
| Omar | Pinzon | Panama Rep. Panama | oapinzon@hotmail.com | 1234567891 | Male | Cricket | Hockey | Spanish | English | Python | Aruba | Japan | 1996 | February | 5 | Abcd1234 | Abcd1234 |

children.description: Omar enters 'Omar' into field for the first name
Omar enters 'Pinzon' into field for the last name
Omar enters 'Panama Rep. Panama' into field to the adress
Omar enters 'oapinzon@hotmail.com' into field to the email
Omar enters '1234567891' into field to the phone
Omar clicks on radio button to choose male gender
